barcodelabelDemo1Desc:
“Since handmade items doesn't have barcodes,
I customize barcode labels with item information such
as materials and colors and attach them to each item.”
barcodelabelDemo1DescMobile: “Since handmade items doesn't have barcodes, I customize barcode labels with item information such as materials and colors and attach them to each item.”
barcodelabelDemo2Desc:
“Item register and search is so convenient
since it only takes a simple barcode scan. Not to mention,
finding item history by scanning is so convenient.”
barcodelabelDemo2DescMobile: “Item register and search is so convenient since it only takes a simple barcode scan. Not to mention, finding item history by scanning is so convenient.”
barcodelabelDesc:
Easily make a barcode that fits your business perfectly.
Even if you can't find what you need from the numerous templates, you can customize from the settings and print from wherever you are right away.
barcodelabelDescMobile:
Easily make a barcode that fits your business perfectly.
Even if you can't find what you need from the numerous templates, you can customize from the settings and print from wherever you are right away.
expiryDemo1Desc:
“Being able to manage expiration dates for the same
item is very helpful since we can put discounts for a
near expiration items right away and prevent expired
wastes.”
expiryDemo1DescMobile: “Being able to manage expiration dates for the same item is very helpful since we can put discounts for a near expiration items right away and prevent expired wastes.”
expiryDemo2Desc:
“With expiry date management for coffee beans,
dairies, fruits for making beverages, it's so much
efficient than before.”
expiryDemo2DescMobile: “With expiry date management for coffee beans, dairies, fruits for making beverages, it's so much efficient than before.”
expiryDesc:
Enter item expiry dates for smooth management.
You can enter different expiration dates even for the same item to check expiry status all at once and receive push notifications before expiring.
expiryDescMobile:
Enter item expiry dates for smooth management.
You can enter different expiration dates even for the same item to check expiry status all at once and receive push notifications before expiring.
locationDemo1Desc:
“We manage identical items in different warehouses and Location Mode helps us to keep track of item in each location.
Also, being able to move stocks in between warehouses also helped us inventory tracking a lot.”
locationDemo1DescMobile:
“We manage identical items in different warehouses and Location Mode helps us to keep track of item in each location.
Also, being able to move stocks in between warehouses also helped us inventory tracking a lot.”
locationDemo2Desc: “창고, 사무실, 쇼룸 등 위치 별로 제품을 관리할 수 있고 재고 이동이 필요할 때는 입출고 없이 이동 기능을 통해 한번에 처리할 수 있어 효율적인 재고 관리가 가능합니다.”
locationDemo2DescMobile: “Because office supplies are managed by floors and offices, only having to add locations when using a supply from a new location saves so much time and energy.”
locationDesc:
Manage by location with Location Mode.
The location-specialized mode helps to manage
stocks by various warehouses efficiently.
locationDescMobile:
Manage by location with Location Mode.
The location-specialized mode helps to manage stocks by various warehouses efficiently.
lowstockDemo1Desc:
“Inserting minimum quantity for each item and
receiving notification helps us to remain the optimum
stock level at all times and prevent stock-outs.”
lowstockDemo1DescMobile: “Inserting minimum quantity for each item and receiving notification helps us to remain the optimum stock level at all times and prevent stock-outs.”
lowstockDemo2Desc:
“Crucial supplies like cooking oil or napkins for our
business are never out of stock thanks to low stock
notification. It's a lifesaver.”
lowstockDemo2DescMobile: “Crucial supplies like cooking oil or napkins for our business are never out of stock thanks to low stock notification. It's a lifesaver.”
lowstockDesc: Insert the minimum stock quantity for each item. Check out the overall quantity and receive push notifications every 9 AM for low stocks.
lowstockDescMobile:
Insert the minimum stock quantity for each item.
Check out the overall quantity and receive push notifications every 9 AM for low stocks.
pageDescription: A variety of features to make your inventory management a breeze is all in BoxHero. Upgrade your inventory with BoxHero today.
pageTitle: BoxHero Features - The Simplest Inventory Management Solution
statusDemo1Desc:
“Being able to upload the clothes by the quality
and attaching a QR-code that holds all information
helped streamline my workflow.”
statusDemo1DescMobile: “Being able to upload the clothes by the quality and attaching a QR-code that holds all information helped streamline my workflow.”
statusDemo2Desc:
“Even for the same medical supplies, we divide by
expiry date, location, serial number for
convenient supply management.”
statusDemo2DescMobile: “Even for the same medical supplies, we divide by expiry date, location, serial number for convenient supply management.”
statusDesc:
With Multi Mode, you can assort each item
by its expiry date, condition, or other values.
Without having to insert information every time,
items are added and sorted by their qualities for easier management.
statusDescMobile:
With Multi Mode, you can assort each item by its expiry date, condition, or other values.
Without having to insert information every time, items are added and sorted by their qualities for easier management.
summaryDemo1Desc:
“From so many transactions, being able to select the date
and item type to view transaction stats all at once saved
me so much time.”
summaryDemo1DescMobile: “From so many transactions, being able to select the date and item type to view transaction stats all at once saved me so much time.”
summaryDemo2Desc:
“Being able to see how many items have been going in
and out right away and exporting the data to an Excel file
helps me organize transactions.”
summaryDemo2DescMobile: “Being able to see how many items have been going in and out right away and exporting the data to an Excel file helps me organize transactions.”
summaryDesc:
View transaction history by period.
Not only dates but also filter by names and categories to find transactions you need and export it in an Excel file.
summaryDescMobile:
View transaction history by period.
Not only dates but also filter by names and categories to find transactions you need and export it in an Excel file.
topDesc:
Pipeline your inventory management
with smart features for your team.
topDescMobile:
Pipeline your inventory management
with smart features for your team.
viewPastQuantityDemo1Desc: “특정 시점의 제품 보유량이 궁금할 때 버튼 클릭 한 번이면 확인할 수 있어 재고를 따로 기록해놓을 필요가 없습니다.”
viewPastQuantityDemo1DescMobile: “특정 시점의 제품 보유량이 궁금할 때 버튼 클릭 한 번이면 확인할 수 있어 재고를 따로 기록해놓을 필요가 없습니다.”
viewPastQuantityDemo2Desc: “작년 말에 사무실에서 어떤 비품을 얼마나 보유하고 있었는지 정확한 조회가 가능해 회계 처리가 쉬워졌어요.”
viewPastQuantityDemo2DescMobile: “작년 말에 사무실에서 어떤 비품을 얼마나 보유하고 있었는지 정확한 조회가 가능해 회계 처리가 쉬워졌어요.”
viewPastQuantityDesc:
특정 시점의 재고량을 한 눈에 볼 수 있습니다.
당시 보유하고 있었던 전체 수량 뿐만 아니라
개별 제품의 수량도 조회할 수 있고 조회 결과를 엑셀로
다운로드할 수 있습니다.
viewPastQuantityDescMobile:
특정 시점의 재고량을 한 눈에 볼 수 있습니다.
당시 보유하고 있었던 전체 수량 뿐만 아니라
개별 제품의 수량도 조회할 수 있고 조회 결과를 엑셀로 다운로드할 수 있습니다.
